item.title: Mission: Impossible 8 Star Reveals What He's Learned After 3 Movies With Tom Cruise: "If I Want To Be A Movie Star, This Is What I Should Be Doing"
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning star Greg Tarzan Davis, who plays Degas, explains what he has learned from Tom Cruise.

item.title: Beetlejuice 2's Charles Deetz Funeral Scene Has A Touching Real-Life Callback To The Original Movie
item.description: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice tells a new story for a new generation of fans, but Tim Burton still created some Easter eggs to pay tribute to the original.

item.title: This Failed Sylvester Stallone Franchise-Starter Is An Unofficial Remake Of Clint Eastwood's 1971 Classic
item.description: A hyperviolent action movie that Sylvester Stallone was hoping would launch a franchise also quietly remade Clint Eastwood's Dirty Harry.

item.title: Halle Bailey Claims DDG Attacked Her, Gets Restraining Order

item.title: Cassie Testifies About First 'Freak-Off' With Diddy
